hadiths.text: Abu Huraira reported Allah's Messenger (ﷺ) as saying:He who spent pairs for the sake of Allah, the guardians of Paradise would call him, (in fact) every guardian of the door (of Paradise would welcome him saying): O, so and so, come on. Upon this Abu Bakr said: Messenger of Allah, (it means) there would be no distress on this person. The Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) said. I hope you would be among them

chapter.ara-name: باب مَنْ جَمَعَ الصَّدَقَةَ وَأَعْمَالَ الْبِرِّ
chapter.eng-name: The virtue of the one who does other kinds of good deeds in addition to giving charity
